body.p: Below is a summary of your Access Control Lists as Liquid Dragon knows them. ACLs are based upon AFS PTS groups. These ACLs give you access to departments. A department has several permissions associated with it, such as a Web-Kickstart directory in AFS and RHN access.

You may manage the Access Control Lists for RLMTools (code name Liquid Dragon) from the Liquid Dragon ACLs page. This allows you to set which ACLs govern access to specific departments and their children.
